mapper.update: UPDATE PARTNER SET score = ( SELECT AVG(r.score_avg) FROM REVIEW r JOIN RESERVATION r2 ON r2.idx = r.reservation_idx WHERE r2.partner_idx = #{partner_idx} AND r.status = 'Y' ) WHERE idx = #{partner_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT partner_idx FROM RESERVATION WHERE idx = #{reservation_idx}

SELECT r.idx AS review_idx , r.content , r.score_avg , DATE_FORMAT(r.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS create_date , (SELECT name FROM USER WHERE idx = r2.user_idx) AS user , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE user_idx = r2.user_idx GROUP BY user_idx) AS user_total_review , r.reply FROM REVIEW r JOIN RESERVATION r2 ON r2.idx = r.reservation_idx WHERE r2.partner_idx = #{partner_idx} AND r.status = 'Y'
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}
